column4: are there any settings for ssh on the server that need to be set to allow it to transfer faster? I'm using scp and sending a file to a ubuntu server and it's only getting 8kB/s, which seems really lslow
what's the easiest ftp server to install on ubuntu, perferably one that doesn't take any configuration?
they all take config, but proftpd is the most documented
i set up proftpd in about 5 minutes
